text: appotu allah, "itu unmai pecupavarkalukku avarkalutaiya unmai palanalikkum nalakum. Kile cata niraruvikal olittotik kontirukkum cuvanapatikal avarkalukkuntu, avarril avarkal enrenrum irupparkal; allah avarkalaip poruntik kontan. Allahvai avarkalum poruntik kontarkal - itu makattana perum verriyakum
